please_enter_password: Please enter your password to continue.
weak_password: Your password is too weak. Please remember this password helps to keep your API keys safe.
password_intro_one: Please setup a password that is used to securely encrypt your settings such as api keys.
password_intro_two: You will be prompted for this password everytime you run Domain Genie.
password_intro_three: This helps to keep your API keys safe and only usable by this app.
password_intro_four: Due to the secure nature of this you will NOT be able to change this password later.
password_confirm_not_match: Confirmation password does not match password
password_creation_error: Error creating password. This is likely a permissions issue.
not_found_message: The domain you were looking for has been removed. If you found this page in error let us know.
edit_name_servers_description: Edit name server records e.g. ns1.example.com
edit_contacts_description: Edit the registrant, admin, billing and tech contacts
export_to_csv_description: Export domains to a CSV file

domains_route.fetching: The genie is working hard to fetch your domains.

domains_route.sync_error_message: Please check you have a valid internet connection.

domains_route.requires_sync_message_two: You can also configure auto-sync from the settings page.

domains_route.no_results: No results were found for your query
